sqlMap.sql: CREATE TABLE kinmuhyoShosai ( nengetsu TEXT, hizuke TEXT, yasumiKubun TEXT, shigyoJikan TEXT, shigyoJikanchi REAL, syuryoJikan TEXT, syuryoJikanchi REAL, kyukeiJikan REAL, jitsudoJikan REAL, sagyoNaiyo TEXT );

INSERT INTO kinmuhyoShosai(nengetsu, hizuke, yasumiKubun, shigyoJikan, shigyoJikanchi, syuryoJikan, syuryoJikanchi, kyukeiJikan, jitsudoJikan, sagyoNaiyo) VALUES (:nengetsu, :hizuke, :yasumiKubun, :shigyoJikan, :shigyoJikanchi, :syuryoJikan, :syuryoJikanchi, :kyukeiJikan, :jitsudoJikan, :sagyoNaiyo);

UPDATE kinmuhyoShosai SET yasumiKubun = :yasumiKubun, shigyoJikan = :shigyoJikan, shigyoJikanchi = :shigyoJikanchi, syuryoJikan = :syuryoJikan, syuryoJikanchi = :syuryoJikanchi, kyukeiJikan = :kyukeiJikan, jitsudoJikan = :jitsudoJikan, sagyoNaiyo = :sagyoNaiyo WHERE nengetsu = :nengetsu AND hizuke = :hizuke;
